attributes.action: Tighten rules on companies that charge under 18s as if they were adults
attributes.background: It is unfair that we, those under 18, are not legally classed as an adult; so cannot vote, buy alcohol, be paid the adult minimum wage etc...  but are expected to pay higher prices as if we were an adult,  such as on buses, at cinemas, theme parks, airlines etc

rejection.details: The Government and Parliament aren't responsible for ticket prices for buses, cinemas, theme parks or airlines.
